ygData.subject: Re: Bard Only Equipment
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, it s odd. Until very very recently this list was populated with discussion of how to get the most from the class not complaining about what how
ygData.messageBody:
>What I foresee is this: to still the slowly rising tide of complaints from
>bards who feel that they have fewer class-specific items than any other
>class,

Actually, it's odd. Until very very recently this list was populated with
discussion of how to get the most from the class not complaining about what
how it was nerfed, broken, ignored, unattended to.
As the latest patches did not change us radically (SoW/Selos/Root/chain have
been messed up in different ways forever), it must be some other factor at
work.

Tszaaz E'Taurguin
